By the end of the course, participants will have a strong portfolio and the confidence to tackle industry challenges.

listItem.text: Overview of digital marketing, graphic design, and video editing basics.
Introduction to AI tools in digital marketing, graphic design, and video editing.
Hands-on sessions: Setting up design and video editing software.
Basics of SEO, content marketing, and video editing workflows.

contentList.title: Core Digital Marketing Skills & AI Tools

listItem.text: SEO strategies and AI-powered SEO tools.
Social media marketing strategies enhanced by AI.
Content marketing and social media strategies.
AI tools for PPC campaign automation and performance optimization.
Hands-on project: Develop a digital marketing strategy using AI tools.
Mastering Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and CorelDRAW.
Designing logos, social media posts, and brand identity kits.
Advanced design techniques: motion graphics, typography, and color theory.
Hands-on project: Create a marketing campaign visual (ads, social media posts, etc.).
Learning Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, and Final Cut Pro.
Basic video editing: cutting, trimming, and syncing audio.
Advanced video editing: color grading, motion graphics, and visual effects.
Hands-on project: Create a video advertisement or promotional content.
Develop an integrated marketing campaign combining video, graphics, and digital marketing.
Storyboarding and scripting for video content.
Final project presentation: Submit a complete marketing campaign including digital ads, social media posts, SEO optimization, and video content.

detailsList.listItem: Master three key digital skills: marketing, graphic design, and video editing.
Leverage AI tools to optimize your workflows and marketing efforts.
Build a comprehensive portfolio with marketing campaigns, graphic designs, and professional videos.
Gain real-world experience through hands-on projects.
Personalized mentorship from industry professionals in digital marketing, graphic design, and video editing.
Receive a certificate upon successful completion to enhance your career prospects.

body.name: Christin P J
body.desc: The program will be taught by industry experts with extensive experience in digital marketing, AI, and automation. Mentors will provide one-on-one guidance, answer questions, and offer insights into real-world applications.
At 29 years old, my favorite compliment is being told that I look like my mom. Seeing myself in her image, like this daughter up top.

courseOverview.title: What you'll learn
courseOverview.desc: Are you new to PHP or need a refresher? Then this course will help you get all the fundamentals of Procedural PHP, Object Oriented PHP, MYSQLi and ending the course by building a CMS system similar to WordPress, Joomla or Drupal. Knowing PHP has allowed me to make enough money to stay home and make courses like this one for students all over the world.
